title: sesterceshop
author: sesterceshop
created_time: May 17, 2023, 08:25:30 AMLast edit: June 07, 2023, 08:41:02 AM by sesterceshop
content: Are you searching for top-notch crypto mining hardware that combines superior quality with competitive prices?Then look no further to the revamped Sesterce Shop > https://shop.sesterce.com/We ship worldwide and provide 24/7 customer service support. We prioritize your satisfaction and aim to provide you with a seamless shopping experience.Visit the Sesterce Shop, explore our crypto-mining hardware collection, and experience the convenience of secure online shopping.Engage with us through our live chat feature, and let us assist you in finding the perfect mining equipment tailored to your needs.Aside from the Sesterce Shop, our mission is to have a strong positive impact on global warming. We achieve this goal by taking an efficient and forward-thinking approach using mobile datacenter units.Through this, we improve the efficiency of renewable energy and bring stability to the power grid.Our core value is innovation: creating disruptive solutions through both the lab and infrastructures.Let's connect ü§ù https://linktr.ee/sesterceIf you have recently purchased from us, please share your experience and reviews of the products that you have purchased below. Thank you.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: I recently purchased three S19J pro+ from your website, and I'm very happy with it. Chat agent was responsive and professional. I ordered using a credit card, and they arrived in about two weeks.Do note that if you're outside the US like me, there will be VAT and import duties. It is best to contact your local customs office to learn how much that will cost you so you won't be surprised.All in all, good job Sesterce. Very happy, cheers.

comments.author: sesterceshop
comments.body: Glad to hear it, and thanks for your business! Yes, VAT and import duties may apply. To learn how much that will cost in your location, contact your local customs office.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Did either of you order some fish along with those miners?? Because I definitely smell something fishy going on here.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on June 27, 2023, 08:55:34 AMDid either of you order some fish along with those miners?? Because I definitely smell something fishy going on here.Sudden interest and praise for this service, from unknown (jr. with 1-2 merits) members without any evidence. Of course, it raises a big red flag.Probably shilling by alt accounts, same way of writing, looking at the history of posts, almost identical interests...
